name: Aram BERBERIAN v. CHARLESTOWN ESTATES, INC.

judges: BEVILACQUA, C. J., did not participate.
parties: Aram BERBERIAN v. CHARLESTOWN ESTATES, INC.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The defendant’s motion to affirm the judgment of the Superior Court pursuant to Rule 16(g) is hereby granted.
BEVILACQUA, C. J., did not participate.

attorneys: Nardone, Turo & Naccarato, Vincent J. Naccarato, Westerly, for defendant.
casebody.head_matter:
Aram BERBERIAN v. CHARLESTOWN ESTATES, INC.
No. 80-117-A.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Dec. 11, 1980.
Aram Berberian, Warwick, pro se.
Nardone, Turo & Naccarato, Vincent J. Naccarato, Westerly, for defendant.
